item.title: UML tools I like to use
item.description: Uml tools i like to use Star uml work flow tapping on element tapping on canvas tapping on element on canvas click on shortcut options to make branches and links to make a relationship drag line and arrow tap on origin then end visual paradigm workflow 1 way drag element onto canvas tap element tap resource catalog other way gesture system (ctrl and left click drag) straight line from object is resource catalog line from object to object is relationship link other
